Both edits are part of the same deprecation refactor for the desired_capabilities parameter in the IE WebDriver constructor. Edit 0 updates the deprecation warning message to indicate the field will be ignored, while Edit 1 removes the code that actually used the desired_capabilities parameter. These edits reference the same parameter (desired_capabilities) and are part of a single coherent change to fully deprecate this functionality. The warning update and the removal of the parameter's usage logic are mechanically linked - after updating the warning to say the field will be ignored, the natural next step is to remove the code that processes it. Either edit could be made first since both are syntactically valid independently, but together they complete the deprecation implementation.
